Imparfait (Imperfect).J'épousais: I used to marry, I used to espouse
Imparfait (Imperfect).Tu épousais: You used to marry, You used to espouse
Imparfait (Imperfect).Il/Elle épousait: He/She used to marry, He/She used to espouse
Imparfait (Imperfect).Nous épousions: We used to marry, We used to espouse
Imparfait (Imperfect).Vous épousiez: You used to marry, You used to espouse (formal)
Imparfait (Imperfect).Ils/Elles épousaient: They used to marry, They used to espouse

Futur simple (Simple Future).J'épouserai: I will marry, I will espouse
Futur simple (Simple Future).Tu épouseras: You will marry, You will espouse
Futur simple (Simple Future).Il/Elle épousera: He/She will marry, He/She will espouse
Futur simple (Simple Future).Nous épouserons: We will marry, We will espouse
Futur simple (Simple Future).Vous épouserez: You will marry, You will espouse (formal)
Futur simple (Simple Future).Ils/Elles épouseront: They will marry, They will espouse
